result.markdown: --- title: "Mixed models" --- ### Content ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} |S |Content | PDF | Videos | SAS | R | |:--|:---------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:| |6e |Random slope |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w6e_randomslope.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/IAzgrldsY48)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/MATH60604A_6e_randomslope.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/MATH60604A_6e_randomslope.R)| |6f |Prediction for mixed models |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w6f_predictionmixed.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/-56kPe2FPwE)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/MATH60604A_6f_predictionmixed.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/MATH60604A_6f_predictionmixed.R)| ::: ::: ### In class: - Theoretical review - conditional and marginal predictions - nested random effects - [partial pooling (blog post)](https://www.tjmahr.com/plotting-partial-pooling-in-mixed-effects-models/) - Analysis of chick growth curves: [SAS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/60604A_random_slope.sas) and [R code](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/files/code/60604A_random_slope.R) ### After class: - [Nested versus crossed effects (optional reading)](https://errickson.net/stats-notes/vizrandomeffects.html)
